text: Görke on 9 March 2016 Christian Görke (born 17 March 1962) is a German politician for Die Linke and was deputy Minister-president of the federal state of Brandenburg from 2014 to 2019. ==Life and achievements== Görke was born 1962 in Rathenow and became a teacher in 1988. In 1985 he joined the Socialist Unity Party of Germany and after German reunification became member of Die Linke, serving as the party's federal chairman in Brandenburg from 2014 to 2018. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:People from Rathenow Category:German politicians Category:Politicians from Brandenburg
title: Christian Görke
